resources.string: Stubble burning in northern India has long been a major cause of air pollution, but efforts to stop it fail every year And its more dangerous this year with Covid-19 ravaging the country as pollution makes people more vulnerable to infection and slows their recovery. According to some estimates, farmers in northern India burn about 23 million tonnes of paddy stubble every year

To avoid this stubble burning,we are here to collect your stubble and dispose it in a safe and environment friendly way.For this,you have to just give your details by filling the form and you can also track the location where the stubble is being disposed
25 srt,baple street, haghway road, near to VJunction, Ameerpet, Hyderabad, Telangana 500016
Have awareness about stubble burning by watching this video!!
